scripts.cv:build: cd apps/CV/devscard && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.cv:publish: cross-env CV_BASE=/cv/ npm run cv:build && npm run cv:sync
scripts.cv:vanilla:build: cd apps/CV/devscard_vanilla && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.cv:vanilla:publish: cross-env CV_BASE=/cv_vanilla/ npm run cv:vanilla:build && npm run cv:vanilla:sync
scripts.cv:en:build: cd apps/CV/devscard_en && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.cv:ru:build: cd apps/CV/devscard_ru && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.cv:en:publish: cross-env CV_BASE=/cv_en/ npm run cv:en:build && npm run cv:en:sync
scripts.cv:ru:publish: cross-env CV_BASE=/cv_ru/ npm run cv:ru:build && npm run cv:ru:sync
scripts.cv:publish:all: npm run cv:en:publish && npm run cv:ru:publish
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run cv:en:dev" "npm run cv:ru:dev" "npm run website:dev"
scripts.build:prod: npm run cms:prodcfg && npm --workspace apps/website run build
